name: Abyssos Project
description:
Abyssos Project is a FPS Immersive Sim that puts the player in the shoes of a nameless engineer. Awoken from stasis, the player must find their way through the Mega-Structure that is the Abyssos Complex in order to repair the mulfunction that caused them to awaken.

This is an Alpha Demo intended to showcase some of the mechanics and environments of the game.

Enjoy.
